WordPress is an open source software that gives you the ability to create websites. WordPress as a software falls under the CMS category also known as a Content Management System.

Why WordPress Is So Popular

WordPress is hands down the most popular way of creating a website and for some very good reasons. Below you'll find a few reasons as to why almost half of the websites online are powered by WordPress.

WordPress Has A Large Community

One of the main benefits of WordPress is it's popularity. The WordPress community is very large and theirs tons of information out their to help you make the adjustment you need.

WordPress Is Easy To Use

One of the main reasons Wordpress is so relevant in the website development field is because of it's very intuitive interface. Unlike coding or other ways of making a website WordPress offers it's users a very clean and organized dashboard backend that makes maintaining a websites doable for anyone.
